member.name: D3D12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE
member.summary: Describes the root signature 1.0 layout of a descriptor table as a collection of descriptor ranges that are all relative to a single base descriptor handle.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE.NumDescriptorRanges
member.summary: The number of descriptor ranges in the table layout.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE.pDescriptorRanges
member.summary: An array of structures that describe the descriptor ranges.
